## SendableMosaic.repayMEUR() method

Adjust existing Trove by repaying some of its debt.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
repayMEUR(amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentMosaicTransaction<S, MosaicReceipt<R, TroveAdjustmentDetails>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The amount of MEUR to repay. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[SentMosaicTransaction](./lib-base.sentmosaictransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [MosaicReceipt](./lib-base.mosaicreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, [TroveAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.troveadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustTrove({ repayMEUR: amount })

```
